55980.summary: Some customers in the Townline Hill area of Abbotsford are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
55980.title: Dec 9 - Abbotsford (Townline Hill) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
